channel.title: Raaah! How do I make a new PVP zone? [317]
channel.description:
I'm not even sure if I'm Delta or PI! I checked multiple guides for both, my source has none of the stuff it says in them. I know its not that mine just doesnt have any and i have to custom make it, because I already have 2 PK zones in my server.
Could anyone give me some help? If anyone could either show me how or I have a teamviewer if that'll help. I made a backup of my server as it is ATM because screwing my server up is not how I want to do it.

item.title: Raaah! How do I make a new PVP zone? [317]
item.dc:creator: @VillainScape VillainScape
item.description:
@VillainScape wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:2, topic:391959”]If it’s PI it should be in Player.java

Just search for Wild and you should see a bunch of things with coordinates. One should say PvP or Fala or something, and under that will be all of the coordinates for pvp zones.

Hope I explained that enough. :o[/quote]

Hmm… must not be PI. The only things with Wild in my Player.java are -

public boolean IsInWilderness = false;

and before that these

public boolean inwildy = false;
public boolean inwildy2 = false;

Read full topic
item.source: Raaah! How do I make a new PVP zone? [317]

item.title: Raaah! How do I make a new PVP zone? [317]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

If it’s PI it should be in Player.java

Just search for Wild and you should see a bunch of things with coordinates. One should say PvP or Fala or something, and under that will be all of the coordinates for pvp zones.

Hope I explained that enough. :o

Read full topic
